actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration and Refugee Policy.
Committee on Judiciary requested executive comment from Justice Department, State Department.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Immigration and Refugee Policy

official_title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to permit the temporary admission to the United States of certain children, survivors, and retirees of staffs of international organizations.
short_title: International Organization Staffs' Children, Survivors, and Retirees Act of 1985

summary.text: International Organization Staffs' Children, Survivors, and Retirees Act of 1985 - Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to include within the definition of "special immigrant" unmarried sons and daughters and surviving spouses of employees of certain international organizations ("I" status). Grants nonimmigrant status to: (1) parents of children receiving "I" status while they are minors; and (2) other children of such parents or a surviving "I" status spouse.

titles.title: International Organization Staffs' Children, Survivors, and Retirees Act of 1985
A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to permit the temporary admission to the United States of certain children, survivors, and retirees of staffs of international organizations.
